General.Name: Daoming Optics&Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Daoming Optics&Chemical Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of reflective materials and products in China and internationally. It offers reflective sheeting and fabrics, vehicle conspicuity marking tapes, battery packaging films, multi-function compound materials, special purpose material, and release materials. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Yongkang, China.
